thread.title: This Girl Let Her Bestie Pick Her First Tattoo, and He Chose His INSTAGRAM HANDLE
thread.title_full: This Girl Let Her Bestie Pick Her First Tattoo, and He Chose His INSTAGRAM HANDLE

author: Anonymous
title: This Girl Let Her Bestie Pick Her First Tattoo, and He Chose His INSTAGRAM HANDLE
text:
9:57pm by Cat Pajamas 
An 18-year-old Vlogger named Elle Mills from Canada decided to let her best friend choose her first tattoo . It sounds like a sweet gesture, until you find out that she also agreed to not look at the finished design until it was permanently inked onto her body . Her friend, Tavian Palacios, decided to use Elle's ankle as a permanent plug for his Instagram account... 
(source) 
As you can see, Elle was not thrilled with her new ink, but while we can't really blame her for her less than enthusiastic reaction to becoming her friend's permanent social media ad, she really should have seen this coming. And according to an interview she did with Buzzfeed News , she did: "I wasn't too mad because honestly I would have done the same. ... It's just the type of friendship we have." 
Would you let your best friend pick out a tattoo for you without knowing what it would be?
